name: Ryan Spradlin
body:
## Contact
* Email: ryan@cotangent.org
* LinkedIn: http://linkedin.com/in/ryanspradlin
* Facebook: http://facebook.com/ryan.spradlin
* Twitter: http://twitter.com/rryyan

## Work
I am a technology consultant at [Accenture](http://www.accenture.com/) in Chicago, IL. Please see my [LinkedIn](http://linkedin.com/in/ryanspradlin) for more employment details.

## Education
I have a BS in [Computer Science](http://cs.illinois.edu/) from the [College of Engineering](http://www.engr.illinois.edu/) at the [University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign](http://illinois.edu/).

## Location
I live in [Chicago, IL](http://maps.google.com/maps?q=chicago+il). I grew up in [Morton, IL](http://maps.google.com/maps?q=morton+il).
